ApplicationGraphConnection.description: Describes the connection between two resources.

direction.description: The direction of the connection. 'Outbound' indicates this connection specifies the ID of the destination and 'Inbound' indicates indicates this connection specifies the ID of the source.

ApplicationGraphOutputResource.description: Describes an output resource that comprises an application graph resource.

ApplicationGraphResource.description: Describes a resource in the application graph.

outputResources.description: The resources that comprise this resource.

connections.description: The connections between resources in the application graph.

ApplicationGraphResponse.description: Describes the application architecture and its dependencies.

environment.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the environment that the application is linked to

values.description: The resource defining this connection accepts inbound connections from the resource specified by this id.

identity.description: Configuration for supported external identity providers

bicepSettings.description: Resource ID of the Bicep settings applied to this environment.

recipeParameters.description: Recipe specific parameters that apply to all resources of a given type in this environment.

IdentitySettingKind.description: IdentitySettingKind is the kind of supported external identity setting

values.name: systemAssignedUserAssigned
values.description: System assigned and user assigned managed identity

IdentitySettings.description: IdentitySettings is the external identity setting.

oidcIssuer.description: The URI for your compute platform's OIDC issuer

resource.description: The resource ID of the provisioned identity

managedIdentity.description: The list of user assigned managed identities

namespace.description: The namespace to use for the environment.

localId.description: The logical identifier scoped to the owning Radius resource. This is only needed or used when a resource has a dependency relationship. LocalIDs do not have any particular format or meaning beyond being compared to determine dependency relationships.

id.description: The UCP resource ID of the underlying resource.

radiusManaged.description: Determines whether Radius manages the lifecycle of the underlying resource.

accountId.description: AWS account ID for AWS resources to be deployed into.

region.description: AWS region for AWS resources to be deployed into.

subscriptionId.description: Azure subscription ID hosting deployed resources.

namespace.description: Kubernetes namespace to deploy workloads into.

ProvisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the resource at the time the operation was called

values.name: Accepted
values.description: The resource create request has been accepted

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The resource has been successfully provisioned

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The resource provisioning has been canceled

RecipeDefinition.description: Recipe definition for a specific resource type

recipeKind.description: The type of recipe (e.g., Terraform, Bicep)

plainHttp.description: Connect to the location using HTTP (not HTTPS). This should be used when the location is known not to support HTTPS, for example in a locally hosted registry for Bicep recipes. Defaults to false (use HTTPS/TLS)

parameters.description: Parameters to pass to the recipe

provisioningState.description: The status of the asynchronous operation

referencedBy.description: List of environment IDs that reference this recipe pack

recipes.description: Map of resource types to their recipe configurations

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The RecipePackResource items on this page

RecipeParameterValue.description: Recipe parameter configuration for a specific resource type.

RecipeStatus.description: Recipe status at deployment time for a resource.

templateKind.description: TemplateKind is the kind of the recipe template used by the portable resource upon deployment.

templatePath.description: TemplatePath is the path of the recipe consumed by the portable resource upon deployment.

templateVersion.description: TemplateVersion is the version number of the template.

compute.description: The compute resource associated with the resource.

recipe.description: The recipe data at the time of deployment

SecretReference.description: Reference to a secret stored in Radius.Security/secrets.

secretId.description: Resource ID of the Radius.Security/secrets entry.

key.description: Key within the secret to retrieve.

TerraformBackendConfiguration.description: Terraform backend configuration matching the terraform block.

TerraformCliConfiguration.description: Terraform CLI configuration matching the terraformrc file.

providerInstallation.description: Provider installation configuration controlling how Terraform installs providers.

credentials.description: Credentials keyed by registry or module source hostname.

TerraformCredentialConfiguration.description: Credential configuration for Terraform provider or module sources.

token.description: Token credential for Terraform Cloud/Enterprise authentication.

TerraformDirectConfiguration.description: Direct installation configuration for Terraform providers.

include.description: Provider addresses included when falling back to direct installation.

exclude.description: Provider addresses excluded from direct installation.

path.description: Destination file path for Terraform logs (maps to TF_LOG_PATH).

TerraformNetworkMirrorConfiguration.description: Network mirror configuration for Terraform providers.

url.description: Mirror URL used to download providers.

include.description: Provider addresses included in this mirror.

exclude.description: Provider addresses excluded from this mirror.

networkMirror.description: Network mirror configuration used to download providers.

direct.description: Direct installation rules controlling when Terraform reaches public registries.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the asynchronous operation.

terraformrc.description: Terraform CLI configuration equivalent to the terraformrc file.

env.description: Environment variables injected into the Terraform process.

logging.description: Logging configuration applied to Terraform executions.

RootScopeParameter.name: rootScope
RootScopeParameter.description: The scope in which the resource is present. UCP Scope is /planes/{planeType}/{planeName}/resourceGroup/{resourcegroupID} and Azure resource scope is /subscriptions/{subscriptionID}/resourceGroup/{resourcegroupID}
